SEARCH
Package datastruct

Class BinaryTreeTable<E extends Comparable<E>,T>

java.lang.Object
datastruct.BinaryTreeTable<E,T>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of the keys
T - the type of the data
All Implemented Interfaces:
Table<E,T>
public class BinaryTreeTable<E extends Comparable<E>,T> extends Object implements Table<E,T>
Implementation of a table of key/data pairs using a binary tree
See Also:

    • insert

      public boolean insert(E key, T data) throws IllegalArgumentException
      If the key does not already exist in the table, this method inserts a new node with the key and data passed as parameters. Returns false if the insertion was not possible.
      Specified by:
      insert in interface Table<E extends Comparable<E>,T>
      Parameters:
      key - the key to insert
      data - the data to insert
      Returns:
      true if the insertion was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the key or the data is null
